roles: Force Commander and Head of Mission
supporting_quotes: He was the first Force Commander and Head of Mission of UNPROFOR, the United Nations Protection Force in the former Yugoslavia during 1992–1993.

roles: Member of the Indian Army Training team
supporting_quotes: During 1977-1979, Nambiar was a part of the Indian Army Training team in Iraq.
During 1983-1987, he worked as a Military Adviser at the High Commission of India, London.

roles: Deputy Chief of the Army Staff (India)
supporting_quotes: He retired as the Deputy Chief of the Army Staff (India) in 1994.

events.canonical_org_name: Institute for Defence Studies and Analyses (IDSA)
supporting_quotes: Since 2011, he is a distinguished fellow of the Institute for Defence Studies and Analyses, New Delhi.
He was an Under Officer with the National Cadet Corps, and joined the 20th regular course of the Indian Military Academy.

events.canonical_org_name: United Nations High Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change
supporting_quotes: He served on the United Nations High Level Panel on 'Threats, Challenges and Change', which provided basis for the UN Secretary General's report to the 2005 World Summit.
